Key Match Events: Riley Greene made a leaping catch at the left-field fence, preventing Ezequiel Tovar from potentially hitting an RBI double or a two-run homer.
Tarik Skubal allowed a run on Jordan Beck’s third-inning home run, a hanging curveball sent deep to left.
Spencer Torkelson hit a two-run, two-out double in the fourth inning, accounting for Detroit’s offense.
Post-Match Reflections: Tarik Skubal expressed disappointment in his performance despite keeping the team in the game.
Spencer Torkelson reflected on the loss, stating that all losses are tough and the team needs to come back ready to go.
